history.proof: intros E t T h. srun best use: agree_empty_left, length_empty, j_agree.

exceptions.exn: In environment E : env ty t : term T : ty h : j (empty ty) t T Unable to unify "j (empty ty) t T" with "j E t T".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j (empty ty) t T -> j E t T

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
empty : forall A : Type, env A
Inductive ty : Set := TyIota : ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty
Inductive j : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2 Arguments JVar _ _%nat_scope [T] Arguments JAbs [E t T1 T2] Arguments JApp [E t1 t2 T1 T2]
weakening : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (U : ty) (E' : env ty), insert x U E = E' -> j E' (shift x t) T
j_ind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) -> forall (e : env ty) (t : term) (t0 : ty), j e t t0 -> P e t t0
j_sind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) -> forall (e : env ty) (t : term) (t0 : ty), j e t t0 -> P e t t0
j_closed : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall k : nat, length E <= k -> closed k t
j_agree : forall (E1 : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E1 t T -> forall (E2 : env ty) (k : nat), agree E1 E2 k -> length E1 <= k -> j E2 t T
type_preservation : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> forall (E : env ty) (T : ty), j E t1 T -> j E t2 T
JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T
JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2
substitution : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert x T1 E) t2 T2 -> forall t1 : term, j E t1 T1 -> j E (subst t1 x t2) T2
closed = fun (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (k : nat) (t : T) => shift k t = t : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> T -> Prop Arguments closed {T}%type_scope {H} _%nat_scope
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
recognize_lift : TraverseRelative -> forall (w k1 k2 : nat) (t : term) (traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term), traverse_ = traverse -> traverse_ (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k2) x)) k1 t = lift w (k1 + k2) t
Record TraverseRelative (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseRelative { traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t } Arguments TraverseRelative {V T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_TraverseRelative [V T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Build_TraverseRelative : forall (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t) -> TraverseRelative
recognize_subst : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseRelative -> forall traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term, traverse_ = traverse -> forall (v : term) (k2 k1 : nat) (t : term), traverse_ (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k2) x) k1 t = subst (lift k1 0 v) (k1 + k2) t
inversion_closed_TAbs : forall (t : term) (k : nat), closed k (TAbs t) -> closed (1 + k) t
Record TraverseVarIsIdentity (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity { traverse_var_is_identity : forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t } Arguments TraverseVarIsIdentity {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t) -> TraverseVarIsIdentity
Record Lift (T : Type) : Type := Build_Lift { lift : nat -> nat -> T -> T } Arguments Lift _%type_scope Arguments Build_Lift [T]%type_scope _%function_scope
expand_subst : forall (v : term) (k : nat) (t : term), subst v k t = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t
RingMicromega.Build_Formula : forall T : Type, EnvRing.PExpr T -> RingMicromega.Op2 -> EnvRing.PExpr T -> RingMicromega.Formula T
ZifyClasses.mkinj : forall (S T : Type) (inj : S -> T) (pred : T -> Prop), (forall x : S, pred (inj x)) -> ZifyClasses.InjTyp S T
subst = fun (V T : Type) (Subst0 : Subst V T) => let (subst) := Subst0 in subst : forall V T : Type, Subst V T -> V -> nat -> T -> T Arguments subst {V T}%type_scope {Subst} _ _%nat_scope
traverse = fun (V T : Type) (Traverse0 : Traverse V T) => let (traverse) := Traverse0 in traverse : forall V T : Type, Traverse V T -> (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T Arguments traverse {V T}%type_scope {Traverse} _%function_scope _%nat_scope
Build_Traverse : forall V T : Type, ((nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T) -> Traverse V T
ZifyClasses.mkbop : forall (S1 S2 S3 T : Type) (Op : S1 -> S2 -> S3) (I1 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S1 T) (I2 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S2 T) (I3 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S3 T) (TBOp : T -> T -> T), (forall (n : S1) (m : S2), ZifyClasses.inj (Op n m) = TBOp (ZifyClasses.inj n) (ZifyClasses.inj m)) -> ZifyClasses.BinOp Op
traverse_term = fix traverse_term (f : nat -> nat -> term) (l : nat) (t : term) {struct t} : term := match t with | TVar x => f l x | TAbs t0 => TAbs (traverse_term f (1 + l) t0) | TApp t1 t2 => TApp (traverse_term f l t1) (traverse_term f l t2) end : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term Arguments traverse_term _%function_scope _%nat_scope
Record TraverseFunctorial (V : Type) (H : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseFunctorial { traverse_functorial : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (t : T) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t } Arguments TraverseFunctorial {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseFunctorial [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
term_rec : forall P : term -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_sind : forall P : term -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_rect : forall P : term -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
ZifyClasses.mkuop : forall (S1 S2 T : Type) (Op : S1 -> S2) (I1 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S1 T) (I2 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S2 T) (TUOp : T -> T), (forall x : S1, ZifyClasses.inj (Op x) = TUOp (ZifyClasses.inj x)) -> ZifyClasses.UnOp Op
ty_ind : forall P : ty -> Prop, P TyIota -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> forall t : ty, P t
ty_rec : forall P : ty -> Set, P TyIota -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> forall t : ty, P t
ty_rect : forall P : ty -> Type, P TyIota -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> forall t : ty, P t
ty_sind : forall P : ty -> SProp, P TyIota -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> forall t : ty, P t

```coq
intros E t T h.
apply h.
Qed.```

original: intros E t T h. apply h.
